name: google-keep-univ
description: 1. html, css, js 2. Form in order to create to do's    -> Title   -> Description    -> Img url   -> Completed   -> Color   -> Submit button & Cancel button 2.1. Save the todo in local storage 3. Create an html list -> based on saved todo's from local storage. 4. Add delete button to a todo -> Delete the item from local storage. 5. Edit -> Reuse create todo form in order to edit a todo -> update local storage with change todo
